name: Logitech K380
bodyContent:
Need a minimin content for slice, if only img will broken Here's the corrected syntax: ejs Copy code <% if (postsByCategory && postsByCategory.length === 0) { %>

No posts

<% } %> In EJS, the opening tag for JavaScript code blocks is <% and the closing tag is %>. Within these tags, you can write regular JavaScript code, including logical operators like &&. The corrected code checks if postsByCategory exists and is not falsy, and if its length is 0, indicating there are no posts in the array. If both conditions are true, it renders "No posts". Otherwise, nothing is rendered.
